effect.text: Discard 2 of the other cards from your hand in order to put a Trainer card from your discard pile into your hand.

cost.description: Discard 2 other cards from your hand

requirements.description: Must have at least 2 other cards in hand to discard
Must have at least one Trainer card in discard pile

tips: Don't use until you've discarded valuable Trainers worth recurring
Prioritize retrieving Trainers that impact the game state immediately
Item Finder getting Item Finder creates a Trainer recursion engine
In late game, retrieve game-winning Trainers like Gust of Wind
Save for critical moments rather than using casually

rulings.ruling: You must discard exactly 2 other cards from your hand to use Item Finder
You can only retrieve Trainer cards from your discard pile, not Pokemon or Energy
You cannot use Item Finder if you have fewer than 2 other cards in hand
You must have at least one Trainer card in your discard pile to use Item Finder
You choose which Trainer card to retrieve
The retrieved Trainer card goes to your hand and can be played immediately if you want
Item Finder itself does not count toward the discard requirement
You can use Item Finder to retrieve another Item Finder from your discard pile
The discarded cards go to your discard pile
You must show your opponent the Trainer card you retrieve
